column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The pizza is definitely cheesy.  Thanks to the fresh tomatoes
column2: the pizza was moist but somehow the thick crust stood up against all the ingredients well.  Comparing it to Pequod's
column3: it's less sauce but tastes more refreshing
column4: or as refreshing as a deep dish possible could.  The crust is a super flaky buttery crust and yes
column5: you can go for the thin version... but unless you live in Chicago
column6: then just go with the deep dish!
